      • Action

        public Action(URI scheme,
      String term,
      String title,
      Collection<Attribute> attributes)
        Constructor. Creates an Action instance with given scheme, term, title and set of attributes.
        Parameters:
        scheme - action's scheme. Cannot be null.
        term - action's term. Cannot be null nor empty.
        title - action's title
        attributes - set of action's attributes

      • Action

      String term)
        Constructor. Creates an Action instance with given scheme and term.
        Parameters:
        scheme - action's scheme. Cannot be null.
        term - action's term. Cannot be null nor empty.
